## inscribedSquare() function

Returns square inscribed in given circle instance. The circle can also be given as centroid &amp; radius.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function inscribedSquare(circle: Circle): Rect;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  circle | <code>Circle</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Rect`
